articles.author: ESPN staff
articles.title: 2023 Ryder Cup - top shots, Djokovic and more in Rome - ESPN
articles.description: American and European golfers are at Rome's Marco Simone Golf & Country Club for the 2023 Ryder Cup. Here are the tournament's must-see moments.
articles.content:
Team U.S. and Team Europe are facing off in the Ryder Cup at Marco Simone Golf & Country Club.
